Posts.Content: All I can say about the fibroids is I have had them for years. My left breast hurts at times as well.  I think the docs can tell do to the density of the breast.  Every six months is usually appropriate I think. Sometimes details from others is so scary here.  If you feel uncomfortable with the docs answer I would go somewhere else.  A second opinion is always good.
